meanings.sent1: She inserts the key into the lock carefully.
meanings.sent2: He always inserts coins into the vending machine.
meanings.sent3: The magician inserts a rabbit into his hat, and voila!
meanings.sent4: She inserts her thoughts into the conversation seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The chef inserts the secret ingredient into the recipe, making it delicious.

meanings.definition: A section of text or image added into a document or publication
meanings.sent1: The magazine includes colorful inserts for the readers.
meanings.sent2: She found a leaflet insert in the newspaper.
meanings.sent3: The student accidentally dropped the insert into the wrong textbook.
meanings.sent4: The brochure insert caught her eye with its vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The catalog insert showcases the latest products beautifully.
